divs: sighting detailswhen outside of my home, facing southward direction i witness 2 ufo���s moving south easterly direction, they were dark metallic in color and appeared to be disc\cylindrical in shape. the fist one became extremely bright and just disappeared. this was followed by a second one, again became extremely bright and disappeared almost at the same spot in the sky. i went into the house and told my wife i spotted 2 ufo���s ���yeah right���. she came outside and i pointed to the sky at the location where i saw them, then all of a sudden we saw two more this time they appeared to adjacent from each other, same scenario, we watch them and they appeared to be very bright and again just disappeared. in the sky at the same time were commercial aircraft leaving contrails heading east to west and vice versa which i have photographed. it was not until i downloaded the photos to my computer that we saw i had captured two ufo���s on my on my camera at same time as the commercial aircraft with contrails. these ufo���s never left any contrail trace in the sky photo attached, both ufo���s are on the same photo 1st photo ufo_1 shows the ufo at top of photo 2nd photo ufo_2 a little harder to see, but blown up can be seen nne of the top contrail. (name moved to fi box) cms 12\30\11 08:51 cst flg
